page.title: 03Katie Jenkins' Day (cont.)
page.content: Later on we may play on the piano or Sarah, Clare, Wendy, Jo and me all have bikes and we play on them. After that we play with the dogs. Sarah has one called Basil, Clare has one called Emma, my brother has one called Ben and I have one called Tina. Ben joins in the fun as I always look after him. We then play{52 In. 52 In}is when someone stands by a post and counts to 52 while everyone else hides. When they have finished counting they start to look for you. The people that hid have got to try to get to the post before the person who was on it and shout{"52 IN",}and the last person to get to the post shouts{"52 IN SAVE {ALL".}We all stay out to eight except me and Wendy. We go in and play chess or something. Then about half past nine I go up to my bedroom and read or play records and tapes. Then I sleep.
